trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Samhandler med parseren å bygge en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily for control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen brukes først og fremst for kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> derived control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en tilpasset kontroll builder for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>avledet kontroll, du vil arve fra denne klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemControlBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemControlBuilder"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether white spaces in the text associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> are represented by <xref href="System.Web.UI.LiteralControl"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om mellomrom i teksten knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> representeres av <xref href="System.Web.UI.LiteralControl"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the inherited implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always indicate that white spaces in the text associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> control are not represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer arvede implementeringen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å angi alltid mellomrom i teksten tilknyttet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>kontrollen ikke er representert med <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
Determines whether HTML entities in the text associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"></xref> are converted to their equivalent characters when the text is parsed.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om HTML-enheter i teksten knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem"> </xref> konverteres til de tilsvarende tegnene når teksten analyseres.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlDecodeLiterals method is used to determine whether HTML entities in the text associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> are converted to their equivalent characters when the text is parsed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden HtmlDecodeLiterals brukes til å fastsette om HTML-enheter i teksten knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>konverteres til de tilsvarende tegnene når teksten analyseres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the inherited implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer arvede implementeringen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden alltid returnere `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.HtmlDecodeLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This indicates that HTML entities in the text associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> control are always automatically converted to their equivalent, plain text characters.
trans-unit.target: Dette indikerer at HTML-enheter i teksten knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>kontrollen alltid automatisk konverteres til de tilsvarende, ren tekst-tegnene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The text associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> is rendered as an attribute of the `<option>` HTML element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Tekst som er tilknyttet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>gjengis som et attributt for den `<option>` HTML-element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>

trans-unit.source: When the attribute is rendered on the client, special characters are automatically converted to their equivalent HTML entity.
trans-unit.target: Når attributtet gjengis på klienten, konverteres automatisk spesialtegn til de tilsvarende HTML-enheten.

trans-unit.source: For example, the less than character (<) is converted to `<`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den mindre enn tegnet (<) is="" converted="" to=""></)>`<`.

trans-unit.source: When the attribute is parsed, HTML entities are automatically converted back to their equivalent, plain text characters.
trans-unit.target: Når attributtet analyseres, konverteres HTML enheter automatisk tilbake til de tilsvarende, ren tekst-tegnene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all cases.
